description: Takes a key name and splits the output for easier access for actions downstream

inputs.description: A text string that represents the name of the key saved for a save_run_data() call
inputs.name: key

inputs.description: Reconstruct data as a valid json path output. If set to False, data will be sent straight to output without parsing.
inputs.name: output_as_json

outputs.description:
Start of output. If data contains valid JSON structures and output_as_json is set to True, access output keys as normal action results,
i.e "*.output.my_key1"
